title: Dangerous immigrant
brief_description: Points out the danger of the chance introduction into Australia - in prefabricated houses and packing cases imported from overseas - of the European house borer, Hylotrupes bajulus. The life history of the pest and methods of detecting and eradicating it are treated in detail.
